author: sviens
msg: Fix for bug JUDDI-41.  For more detailed information see: http://nagoya.apache.org/jira/browse/JUDDI-41

author: sviens
msg: Adding UDDI v2 and v3 XML schemas to assist in message validation.

author: sviens
msg: The save_tModel request has been updated to physically remove (i.e. DELETE) an existing TModel prior re-INSERTing it.  This fix resoves issue JUDDI-37 (http://nagoya.apache.org/jira/browse/JUDDI-37). When performing a delete_tModel the DELETED column of the associated TMODEL row is set to the value 'true'.

author: sviens
msg: Applied PostgreSQL MONITOR table fix recommeded by Jonathan as described in bug# JUDDI-40 (http://nagoya.apache.org/jira/browse/JUDDI-40)

author: sviens
msg: Correcting broken reference to document-v12.dtd and fixing XML validation errors discovered in the process.
